verses.roman:
paravyome vāsudevādi--nija nija astra-dhara
tāṅra mata kahi, ye-saba astra-kara

synonyms: para-vyome—in the spiritual sky; vāsudeva-ādi—beginning with Lord Vāsudeva; nija nija—Their own respective; astra-dhara—holding of different weapons; tāṅra mata kahi—I am speaking the opinion of Siddhārtha-saṁhitā; ye-saba—all; astra-kara—weapons in the different hands.
translation: "Thus in the spiritual sky the expansions, headed by Vāsudeva, hold weapons in Their own respective order. I am repeating the opinion of Siddhārtha-saṁhitā in describing Them.
